cause.description:
Our friend is running the October 7th marathon in Chicago. His goal is to raise $4,000 for leukemia, lymphoma, Hodgkin lymphoma and myeloma research. We would like to help him by creating a Facebook Cause on his behalf. Please donate any amount for the fight against these life shattering diseases.
http://www.active.com/donate/tntsofl/tntsoflPMcCaul
Thank you
1. Raising money will help fund life-saving research
cause.mission: Help stop leukemia, lymphoma, Hodgkin lymphoma and myeloma from taking more lives
cause.name: Raise Money for Leukemia & Lymphoma
